1:
The wind roars. 
It roars past our home.
2:
The wind is powerful. 
It tears my kite from
my hand.
3:
I run after my kite. 
The wind blows me
away from the kite!
4:
The wind becomes
a tornado. 
It carries my kite
higher and higher.
5:
The tornado
swallows me up!
I see nothing,
I touch nothing.
6:
Where is my kite now?
Perhaps it is caught
in a tree.
7:
Perhaps my kite is
still flying in the sky.
8:
The wind finally
dies down. 
I am still spinning.
9:
When I stop spinning
I look around. 
Where did the wind go?
10:
I cannot see my
kite anywhere. 
I cannot hear the
wind anymore.
11:
Perhaps tomorrow
I will find my kite.
12:
Now, I must go home,
before the wind starts
to roar again.
